title: Start
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<tsuki_changeanim>>
<<tsuki_anim hi>>
Hi kids!!!
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Welcome back to this wonderful program.
As you know, I am Tsuki and I am your beloved host.
No?
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
Second broadcast and we come with more fun for you.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
What activity do we do first?
Blow up balloons?
Search for objects?
We can do whatever you want.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
They are ready?
<<kids_yey>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<pause 2>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<stop_music>>
I love that mood.
<<kids_normal>>
Well let's get started.
<<kids_normal>>
<<play_music_a>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<end>> end

title: activities
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
Well...
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<option_activities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
What activities do you want to do?
<<none>>

title: charla0
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Sometimes watching our favorite cartoons is something that helps us entertain ourselves.
But finding one we like can be complicated.
Sometimes we just don't know which one to watch.
<<tsuki_flip>>
And with the large number of cartoons there are.
Well, it's very difficult to know which one to watch.
He he.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: comercialpause
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
I have bad news, kids.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
But it's time for a commercial break.
But don't worry...
We'll see you in a few minutes.
<<commercialPause>>
<<end>> end

title: charla1
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Many are afraid of the dark, right?
<<pause 2>>
Come on, don't be sorry.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
I was afraid of the dark when I was little.
Being afraid of her is normal.
<<tsuki_flip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
But they don't really have to fear him.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Although it is quite uncomfortable to be in the dark.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Nothing can harm us.
Those monsters that we think are in it are just a figment of our imagination. [color=#b561a8]That's what they make us believe. [/color]
As children we tend to misinterpret what is in the dark.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
They don't have to be afraid.
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla2
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do many of you like the moon?
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
That celestial body that illuminates our night.
The moon is incredible.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Many admire her.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
I am one of those people.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do you feel admiration for the moon too?
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
It's really fascinating to see.
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: searchobjectsStart
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do you want to play fetch?
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
That seems fine to me.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Let's see if they find them all.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<startSearch>> end

title: object0
body:

Furry and pretty.
Dark in color and pretty eyes.
<<object_search>>
What object is it?
<<end>>

title: goodSearch
body:
<<tsuki_anim good>>
<<objectCorrect>>
Very well done.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
Let's see if you can guess the next one.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<continueGame>> end

title: badSearch
body:

Too bad, time is up.
Let's see if you can guess the next one.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<continueGame>> end

body:

I'm sorry but that's not the item I'm looking for.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Let's see if you can guess the next one.
<<continueGame>> end

body:
Well, I hope you had fun.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Let's continue looking for objects again.
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 0>>
<<end>> end

title: story0
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Have you heard the story of the ugly duckling?
<<pause 2>>
No?
Well, let me tell you.
Let me tell you his story.
<<tsuki_flip>>
One day, a goose laid some eggs, but there was one of them that was much bigger than the rest.
In that egg was a duck whose appearance made him look different from his brothers.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
'Ugly' is what they called the duck whose appearance made him look different from the others.
One day the mother goose takes her children to a farm.
But the chickens, pigs and animals that lived there mocked him for his appearance.
'Ugly' they called him, pecked him and laughed.
Even his mother didn't love him.
'Ugly' is what they called the duckling who was not like his brothers, he could only get away from his family.
Without a fixed direction, he just walked away from that place where he was not accepted for his appearance.
On his way, he met a little mouse who became his friend regardless of his appearance.
<<tsuki_flip>>
They chatted and laughed.
The duckling and the mouse became inseparable.
Without caring about his appearance, the little mouse was at his side.
As time went by, 'Ugly' was what they called the duckling that was rejected by others.
It grew and grew.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
But something had changed, that's how he felt.
For some reason the swans on the lakes no longer found it strange.
They didn't even laugh at him.
'Why is that?' he wondered.
One day when he and the mouse were at a lake, the duckling saw his reflection for the first time in a long time.
And he realized something incredible.
She had turned into a beautiful swan.
Excited by this he just cried with joy.
The little mouse knew about her change.
<<tsuki_flip>>
But she simply told him.
'I've never cared what you looked like.'
Well, I think I should leave it here.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Although I didn't tell you the original version, that's the one I know.
He he.
They like me?
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 5>>
<<end>> end

title: story1
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do you know the story of the tortoise and the hare?
Well, it's the story of how a slow tortoise beat a fast hare.
And it goes like this.
One day, a tortoise and a hare were talking.
During that conversation, the hare at one point said...
<<tsuki_flip>>
[i]'We hares are very fast, I don't think anyone can beat us in a race'[/i]
To this the turtle responded...
[i]'I can beat you in a race.'[/i]
<<tsuki_noflip>>
The hare, upon hearing that, simply laughed.
[i]'Hahaha, a slow turtle like you wouldn't be able to beat me'[/i]
The turtle, so calm, simply responded.
[i]'I challenge you to a race.'[/i]
[i]'Let's see who is faster.'[/i]
The hare confidently accepted, because according to her a tortoise would not be able to beat him.
<<tsuki_flip>>
The challenge is...
'Whoever reaches the tree 15 minutes from here first wins'
Said the hare.Â­
Then, the challenge began.
On your marks, ready and out...
<<tsuki_noflip>>
The hare took off, while the tortoise started at a slow pace.
Running and running, the hare got so far away that he lost sight of the tortoise.
'It is assured that I will be the winner'
Said the hare.
So confident, she decided to take a nap.
<<tsuki_flip>>
The tortoise came to where the hare was sleeping.
And he continued on his way.
Upon waking up, the confident hare continued on his way to the tree.
But when he arrived he realized that the turtle had beaten him.
A tortoise showed that he could beat a hare.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Although I didn't tell you the original version, it's more or less the same.
I hope you liked it.
//<<play_music_a>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 5>>
<<end>> end

title: storySelect
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
What story do you want to hear?
<<none>>

title: charla3
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
The beaches are undoubtedly truly incredible places.
It helps us cool down and even more so on these hot days.
Although many do not simply go to the beach to cool off.
<<tsuki_flip>>
Many go just to admire its beauty.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Beaches are one of the most beautiful places on earth.
<<tsuki_flip>>
But I think that humans have damaged the planet too much and the beaches are greatly affected by our pollution.
So we must do our part to take care of our fragile ecosystem.
I hope many of you want to take care of our only home.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
Our beautiful land.
Do you want your home?
<<pause 4>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
Well said.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla4
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Many of you have surely thought about love.
<<pause 2>>
Come on, don't be ashamed to say it.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
However, falling in love is a topic for adults.
Many children come to have that innocent and pure love that can even last for years.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Although, being children they cannot understand all the importance and responsibility of having a relationship.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
When they grow up they will understand.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla5
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Going to school is sometimes annoying.
No?
But you must keep in mind that school is a place where we go to learn.
We can also meet new friends.
<<tsuki_flip>>
But seeing it as something we should hate is not correct.
We must see it as a place that helps us learn.
OK?
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla6
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
The burgers, pizzas and hot dogs are certainly delicious.
But eating them in excess is not good.
Like sweets, junk food is not good to eat in excess.
<<tsuki_flip>>
It can make us overweight and increase the risk of suffering from heart disease.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
We can't stop eating them, but it shouldn't be the only thing we eat either.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
So remember, eating healthy is necessary.
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
We can indulge ourselves from time to time.
But eating healthy is better.
<<kids_yey>>
<<kids_happy>>
Very good.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla7
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Many of you love your parents, right?
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
Excellent.
<<kids_normal>>
Loving them is something we must do.
Since they always want our good.
<<tsuki_flip>>
Sometimes when we are little we think that they just want us not to have fun.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
But that's not true.
Although sometimes a parent exaggerates what their child does.
Parents only want the best for their child.
So don't think that they are against you.
Love them and love them.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
OK?
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
Excellent.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla8
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
The internet is undoubtedly an impressive source of information.
But although it has useful information, unfortunately it is also full of harmful information and content.
Controlling what we see on the internet is a good way to avoid encountering that content.
<<tsuki_flip>>
It is the parents' job to control the content you see.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
But I think seeing all content as harmful is not right.
The internet is full of positive information.
What we can use to learn.
<<tsuki_flip>>
Use the internet responsibly and in moderation.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

title: charla9
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Do you like sports?
To me not much.
I'm not very good at them.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<tsuki_flip>>
Maybe because I'm very lazy.
He he.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Playing sports is something that helps us stay healthy.
Many of us perhaps see them as something that forces us to get up.
Others see them as something really fun to do.
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
I wish I saw them like this.
He he.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<addPoint 1>>
<<end>> end

body:

title: resumeShow
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<tsuki_changeanim>>
<<tsuki_anim hi>>
Hello again kids!!
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
Welcome again.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Let's continue where we left off.
OK?
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
I love his encouragement.
<<kids_normal>>
<<allowActivities>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
<<summarize>>
<<end>> end

title: showEnd
body:
<<namebox_name Tsuki>>
<<NoActivities>>
<<tsuki_noflip>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Kids, I have bad news.
But we're running out of time and we have to leave the show here.
<<pause 2>>
<<tsuki_flip>>
But as you know, we'll see you here tomorrow for more fun.
<<tsuki_noflip>>
So as we did in the last broadcast, with a loud shout of joy we must say goodbye.
No?
<<tsuki_anim happy>>
<<kids_happy>>
<<kids_yey>>
<<pause 4>>
That's how I like it.
<<kids_normal>>
<<tsuki_anim idle>>
Well...
<<tsuki_anim hi>>
See you soon.
<<showEnd>>
<<end>> end
